func:
msg.payload=
        { "name": "admin", "deleted": false, "permissions": [
            { "module": "App settings", "moduleId": msg.payload.filter(e => e.name ==='App settings')[0]._id, "canCreate": true, "canRead": true, "canEdit": true, "canRemove": true }, 
            { "module": "Demo", "moduleId": msg.payload.filter(e => e.name === 'Demo')[0]._id, "canCreate": true, "canRead": true, "canEdit": true, "canRemove": true }, 
            { "module": "Base", "moduleId": msg.payload.filter(e => e.name === 'Base')[0]._id, "canCreate": true, "canRead": true, "canEdit": true, "canRemove": true }, 
            { "module": "Users", "moduleId": msg.payload.filter(e => e.name === 'Users')[0]._id, "canCreate": true, "canRead": true, "canEdit": true, "canRemove": true }, 
            { "module": "Management", "moduleId": msg.payload.filter(e => e.name === 'Management')[0]._id, "canCreate": true, "canRead": true, "canEdit": true, "canRemove": true }], 
        "createdAt":Date.now() }
        
msg.collection = "admin_roles"

return msg;

name: return res
return res
set filename
default data
ENV
func:
const data = msg.payload

let process_env = {
    OPENAI_API: data.openai_api,
    PIPECONE_API: data.pipecone_api,
    PIPECONE_ENV: data.pipecone_env,
    PIPECONE_INDEX: data.pipecone_index,
    PIPECONE_URL: data.pipecone_url,
    PROMPT: data.prompt,
}

global.set("process_env", process_env)
return msg;

func:
msg.buffer = msg.req.files[0].buffer

msg.decodedFilename = '/data/storage/' + msg.req.files[0].originalname

msg.payload = {
    _id: msg._id,
    knowledgeBaseId: msg.oldPayload.id,
    name: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    type: "FAQ",
    file: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    vectors: [],
    status: "Source saved",
    deleted: false,
    createdAt: new Date()
};
return msg;

name: file
func:
msg.buffer = msg.req.files[0].buffer

msg.decodedFilename = '/data/storage/' + msg.req.files[0].originalname

msg.payload = {
    _id: msg._id,
    knowledgeBaseId: msg.oldPayload.id,
    name: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    type: msg.type,
    file: msg.req.files[0].originalname,
    vectors: [],
    status: "Source saved",
    deleted: false,
    createdAt: new Date()
};
return msg
